incident_updates.body:
Cloudflare is working to restore impacted services. Below is a non-exhaustive list of the services currently impacted:

Material changes since last update: Email Notifications restored, Healthcheck analytics restored, 

Data plane impact (i.e. full product functionality is either fully impacted or partially impacted):
* Email Notifications: Restored
* Logpush: A large number of Logpush jobs have now been restored, and we expect the large majority to be restored by 07:00 UTC. Most logs were lost during the incident; we will provide a full assessment once the incident is resolved
* Cloudflare dashboard: Dashboard availability restored
* Analytics and GraphQL API: Most analytics available in the dashboard and API have been restored. Some analytics datasets remain unavailable and will be restored in the coming hours. 
* Workers Analytics Engine: Not available
* API: Restored
* Stream: Restored
* Healthchecks: Restored 
* Radar: Degraded
* Support Services: Portal, Phone, Chat are all operational
* Email Routing API: Restored
* CASB (Cloud Access Security Broker): CASB API is online. Scanning engine is actively recovering, and is expected to have no data loss. Scanning engine recovery is expected to continue throughout the weekend.
* DEX (Digital Experience Monitoring): DEX API is online. Fleet status, HTTP, and Traceroute Test Result data are actively being restored with an expected recovery around Saturday Nov 4 15:00 UTC.
* DNS Updates: Restored


Control plane impact (i.e. product functionality is online however changes to configuration is impacted):
* Access API: Restored
* Images API: Restored
* Magic Transit:  Restored
* Magic WAN: Restored
* SOC Proactive Alerts: Restored
* Argo Smart Routing: Configuration now working, smart updates and analytics are offline
* Billing API: Only read-only operations can be performed
* Registrar API: Only read-only operations can be performed
* Lists: Updates to list items are temporarily suspended
* SSL:  Restored
* SSL for SaaS:  Restored
* ZT Gateway:  Restored
* Area 1 Email Security:  All impacted services restored
* Cloudflare Pages: Restored
* Direct Upload Deployments: Restored

incident_updates.body:
We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

The following products are currently impacted at the data plane / edge level, meaning that the full product functionality is either partially or fully affected: Logpush, WARP / Zero Trust device posture, Cloudflare dashboard, Cloudflare API, Stream API, Workers API, Alert Notification System.

These products are impacted at the control plane / core level, meaning that only the changes to the existing configuration are affected, but the product is functioning at the edge: Magic Transit, Argo Smart Routing, Workers KV, WAF, Rate Limiting, Rules, WARP / Zero Trust Registration, Waiting Room, Load Balancing and Healthchecks, Cloudflare Pages, Zero Trust Gateway, DNS Authoritative and Secondary, Cloudflare Tunnel, Workers KV namespace operations, Magic WAN, Cloudflare Images.

incident_updates.body:
Cloudflare is assessing a loss of power impacting data centres while simultaneously failing over services. We are working to resolve this problem. 

The following products are currently impacted at the data plane / edge level, meaning that the full product functionality is either partially or fully affected: Logpush, WARP / Zero Trust device posture, Cloudflare dashboard, Cloudflare API, Stream API, Workers API, Alert Notification System.

These products are impacted at the control plane / core level, meaning that only the changes to the existing configuration are affected, but the product is functioning at the edge: Magic Transit, Argo Smart Routing, Workers KV, WAF, Rate Limiting, Rules, WARP / Zero Trust Registration, Waiting Room, Load Balancing and Healthchecks, Cloudflare Pages, Zero Trust Gateway, DNS Authoritative and Secondary, Cloudflare Tunnel, Workers KV namespace operations, Magic WAN, Cloudflare Images.

We will keep providing regular updates until the issue is resolved.

Cloudflare is still investigating issues with Cloudflare Dashboard and related APIs.

This issue is impacting all services that rely on our API infrastructure including Alerts, Dashboard functionality, Zero Trust, WARP, Cloudflared, Waiting Room, Gateway, Stream, Magic WAN, API Shield, Pages, Workers. 

Customers using the Dashboard / Cloudflare APIs are impacted as requests might fail and/or errors may be displayed.

incident_updates.body:
Cloudflare is investigating issues with Cloudflare Dashboard and related APIs.

These issues do not affect the serving of cached files via the Cloudflare CDN or other security features at the Cloudflare Edge.

Customers using the Dashboard / Cloudflare APIs are impacted as requests might fail and/or errors may be displayed.
